sn35.129:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
sn35.129:1.2: Atha kho ghosito gahapati yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho ghosito gahapati āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.129:1.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn35.129:1.5: “Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca manāpā, cakkhuviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.7: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca amanāpā, cakkhuviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.9: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca manāpā upekkhāvedaniyā, cakkhuviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.11: saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca manāpā, jivhāviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.13: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca amanāpā, jivhāviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.15: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca upekkhāvedaniyā, jivhāviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.17: saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca manāpā, manoviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.19: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca amanāpā, manoviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.21: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca upekkhāvedaniyā, manoviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:1.23: Ettāvatā kho, gahapati, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti.
